CustomField.description: Defines how the exception is applied: Pay Code — excludes based on the related Pay Code for the Employment Cost. Worker Type — excludes based on the Worker Type of the Job Role for the Employment Cost.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines how the exception is applied: Pay Code — excludes based on the related Pay Code for the Employment Cost. Worker Type — excludes based on the Worker Type of the Job Role for the Employment Cost.
CustomField.label: Exception Type
